summary: This is an email from Justin Houston, a Program Manager at SigNet Technologies/Conserpnt Federal Solutions, regarding FBOP (Federal Bureau of Prisons) contracts. It contains a confidentiality notice warning that the email and attachments may contain protected information.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.context: Sender of the email, identified as a Program Manager for FBOP Contracts at SigNet Technologies/Conserpnt Federal Solutions.

keyFacts: Justin Houston is a Program Manager for FBOP (Federal Bureau of Prisons) contracts at SigNet Technologies/Conserpnt Federal Solutions.
